Name: Ancient City of Damascus
Description: Ancient City of Damascus - UNESCO World Heritage Site. One of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world.

Name: Ancient City of Bosra
Description: Ancient City of Bosra - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Roman city with one of the best-preserved Roman theaters.

Name: Site of Palmyra
Description: Site of Palmyra - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient Semitic city with impressive Roman ruins.

Name: Ancient City of Aleppo
Description: Ancient City of Aleppo - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historic city with one of the largest covered souks in the world.

Name: Medieval Fortresses
Description: Crac des Chevaliers and Qal'at Salah El-Din - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Two of the most important medieval fortresses in the Middle East.

Name: Ancient Villages
Description: Ancient Villages of Northern Syria - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Collection of abandoned Byzantine villages.
